name: Connected (GMTK GAME JAM)
description:
Hello one and all this game was made for the GMTK Game Jam and this is my first every game jam so please go easy on me when it comes to criticism but I will so please just tell me what you think and tell me on how you could improve and that's it so enjoy

================

Controls

================

UP arrow = jump

LEFT arrow = walk left

RIGHT arrow = walk right

=================

Plot

=================

In this game you play as a robot named Billy and Billy has the power to connect his consciousness to other robots and Billy also is a Test Subject to and his test mostly consist of dying on spikes and the scientist are trying to see how fast Billy can beat the courses they built for him 

================
